alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cudjoe Key, or 8 miles northwest of Niles Channel Bridge, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Niles Channel Bridge, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Sunset Key, Shark Key and Little Torch Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 29. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
